column11: 2015 in holyoke. she was born in northampton
column12: daughter of the late alfred and rose (leduc) briere. anne marie was a graduate of st. michael high school in northampton and the former providence hospital school of nursing. she was a registered nurse in arizona for many years. anne marie was a communicant of blessed sacrament church and a member of the secular franciscan order. she is survived by a daughter
